relproducts.title: Rimini Coffee - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Think luxurious, rich, creamy cappuccino, and you've got the feel of the rimini in coffee. This is the perfect neutral shade - soft enough to fit well amongst other, richer shades, yet distinct enough to work as a colour all by itself. Nestle amongst rich browns, pale creams, and vintage golds to really make the most of this subtle hue, which makes a beautiful, sophisticated accent for a bedroom or living room window.

relproducts.title: Rimini Chocolate - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mocha brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm mocha brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft latte brown roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Chocolate Brown
relproducts.description: Stirlochocolate brown plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Valencia Latte Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Rich and smooth, this valencia latte vertical blind is ever so elegant. Its neutral colourway is the ideal accompaniment to other natural shades. While keeping your room looking open and light, you can adjust each louvre to let in swathes of light or simply allow a gentle glow to rich and smooth, this valencia latte vertical blind is ever so elegant.

relproducts.title: Valencia Latte Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Just when you thought your home decor was safe from your sweet tooth, you've found this gorgeous valencia latte roller blind. The creamy tone of the fabric will give your room a gorgeous, natural accent while the rich colouring will keep your room feeling snug and warm all year just when you thought your home decor was safe from your sweet tooth, you've found this gorgeous valencia latte roller blind.

Add something different to the style of any room with their mocca blind. This blind is ideal with neutral colour schemes. relproducts.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. relproducts.title: Heritage Fern - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Featuring muted pinks, greens, and greys, the heritage fern offers understated beauty, displaying an array of blossoms, leaves, and feathered friends. The creamy background makes the perfect base, offsetting the sweet colours beautifully. Pair the fern with pastel-toned walls for a romantic look in the master bedroom, where mixing it with fellow creams, pinks, and greys will mean it fits right in.

relproducts.title: Heritage Midnight - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Aptly named, the heritage in midnight features a deep royal blue base, adorned with an ornate floral and bird pattern in pretty pale pastel tones. The colours offset each other beautifully, making this roman blind a real work of art. The midnight would look beautiful in the dining room amidst dark to medium woods, plenty more regal blue hues, and gold fixtures and finishings. Accent with pastel tones to lighten the mood, resulting in a glamorous look that you and your guests can relax in and enjoy.

relproducts.title: Heritage Cedar - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: On a charcoal black background sit beautifully painted florals, foliage, and birds, and this stunning work of art is the heritage in cedar. Barely there pastel blues, pinks, and greens pop from the base colour, just as they should. Create some drama in the dining room by including the cedar in your dcor scheme. Choose dark furniture and glamorous accessories, using the pastel tones in the blind to accent throughout the room, for a coordinated look that's full of depth.

relproducts.title: Heritage Sandstone - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The sandy grey of the heritage sandstone provides a beautifully neutral base adorned with birds, flowers, and foliage in an attractive charcoal shade, with ice white detailing. These naturally toned hues mean that this is a versatile blind that will work as part of a number of dcor schemes. The sandstone would work wonderfully as part of a neutral hallway or upstairs landing, or even in the downstairs cloakroom or utility.
